ModMetaData.name: [1.1] Decorative Cliffs
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds: -stone cliffs -dirt hills
Future plans: -toolbox mod options -brick cliffs
Stairs in the pictures are not included: Vee's decorating: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1585057683
Can be safely added to existing saves.
If you find things unbalanced, please make suggestions for improvement.
